title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Transdisciplinary (T-Skill) Design for Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics knowledge and intermediate expertise in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking and creative problem-solving strategies to mathematical problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy
Learners can complete team projects utilizing collaboration and communication skills through three or more peer feedback iterations
Learners can apply data analysis and digital literacy skills to real-world professional scenarios through case studies reflected in their learner portfolios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
